flawed_nl_solution:
Out of the 40, 40 x 1/10 = <<40*1/10=4>>4 students are absent.
So, 40 - 4 = <<40-4=63>>63 students are present in school.
Out of the 63, 63 x 3/4 = <<63*3/4=189/4>>189/4 students are in the classroom.
This means, 63 - 189/4 = <<63-189/4=63/4>>63/4 students are in the canteen.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 36, not 63. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
